meanings.definition: Not conducive to good health; not healthy.
meanings.sent1: Eating too much candy is unhealthy for your teeth.
meanings.sent2: She knew that smoking was an unhealthy habit.
meanings.sent3: It's quite unhealthy to binge-watch TV shows all day.
meanings.sent4: The relationship between them was like an unhealthy obsession.
meanings.sent5: The dark, moldy room had an unhealthy smell that made her nauseous.

meanings.definition: Not in a state of good or normal health; sick.
meanings.sent1: After eating the expired food, he felt unhealthy and nauseated.
meanings.sent2: The flu made her feel very unhealthy and weak.
meanings.sent3: The plant looked unhealthy, so she watered it more.
meanings.sent4: The team's performance was like an unhealthy patient on life support.
meanings.sent5: The unhealthy cat sneezed and coughed, clearly not feeling well.

meanings.sent1: Excessive exposure to the sun can be unhealthy for your skin.
meanings.sent2: The polluted air in the city was very unhealthy to breathe.
meanings.sent3: His unhealthy obsession with video games affected his grades.
meanings.sent4: The gossip spread like an unhealthy virus in the office.
meanings.sent5: The storm caused an unhealthy amount of damage to the crops.
